nodes.id: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的省级纪律检查机关，与黑龙江省监察委员会合署办公。
description.en: The provincial-level discipline inspection agency of the Communist Party of China in Heilongjiang, which works jointly with the Heilongjiang Provincial Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 黑龙江省的监察机关，与中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会合署办公。
description.en: The supervisory commission of Heilongjiang Province, which works jointly with the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会副书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as a Deputy Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal control institution of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党黑龙江省代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在黑龙江省的最高权力机关。
description.en: The highest authority of the Communist Party of China in Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党纪律检查机关

zh-cn: 中国共产党纪律检查机关

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党负责执行纪律、检查路线、方针、政策和决议执行情况的专职机关。
description.en: The specialized agencies of the Communist Party of China responsible for enforcing discipline and inspecting the implementation of lines, principles, policies, and resolutions.

relationships.source: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会与黑龙江省监察委员会合署办公。
description.en: The CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and the Heilongjiang Provincial Supervisory Commission work together in a joint office.

relationships.source: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会是中央纪律检查委员会的下级机构。
description.en: The CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection is a subordinate body of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

relationships.source: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党黑龙江省代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会由中国共产党黑龙江省代表大会选举产生，并对其负责。
description.en: The CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection is elected by and responsible to the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Congress.

relationships.source: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会是中国共产党的组成部分。
description.en: The CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection is a component of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党纪律检查机关

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省纪律检查委员会是中国共产党的省级纪律检查机关。
description.en: The CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection is a provincial-level discipline inspection agency of the Communist Party of China.
